cards.title: Generate data from a prompt
cards.description: Use Navigator to edit, augment, and create data from scratch.

cards.title: Generate synthetic tabular data
cards.description: Create highly accurate synthetic tabular training data for ML models.

sampleDataset.description: Use this sample electronic health records (EHR) dataset to synthesize an entirely new set of statistically equivalent records.

cards.title: Synthesize a database
cards.description: Synthesize a database using Gretel Relational.

sampleConnection.description: Use this sample telecommunications database to synthesize an entirely new database of statistically equivalent records, while maintaining referential integrity.

cards.title: Redact PII in sensitive data
cards.description: Safeguard sensitive information and uphold compliance standards by automatically removing private information from datasets.

sampleDataset.description: This patient dataset contains names, addresses and other personally identifiable information, which needs to be redacted before the dataset can be shared or used to train ML models.

cards.title: Create provably private versions of sensitive data
cards.description: Use Gretel Tabular DP, our graph-based generative model, to generate synthetic data with strong differential privacy guarantees.

sampleDataset.description: This dataset contains direct marketing campaign details (phone calls) from a Portuguese financial institution. It has sensitive information such as demographics and financials, which can benefit from privacy preserving techniques before sharing.

cards.title: Generate synthetic text data using GPT
cards.description: Quickly generate diverse text examples for natural language tasks, simplifying the generation of labeled datasets.

sampleDataset.description: Create realistic banking-related questions and intent labels using this sample dataset.

cards.title: Auto-tune synthetic data parameters
cards.description: Automate hyperparameter sweeps to create the best synthetic data for your task.

cards.title: Generate high-quality time series data
cards.description: Use DoppelGANger to create accurate and correlated time-series data.

sampleDataset.description: Safely synthesize a dataset of daily website visitors while maintaining correlations and data patterns.

cards.title: Redact PII in a database
cards.description: Safeguard sensitive information and uphold compliance standards by automatically removing private information from your database.

sampleConnection.description: This telecommunications dataset contains names, addresses, social security numbers, and other personally identifiable information, which needs to be redacted before the dataset can be shared or used to train ML models.

cards.title: Synthesize data + evaluate ML performance
cards.description: Evaluate synthetic data performance on classification and regression models.

sampleDataset.description: Create synthetic data based on the publicly available dataset predicting opting in or out of bank marketing.

cards.title: Synthesize data at scale
cards.description: Create large volumes of synthetic records for demos and scale testing.

sampleDataset.description: Use this dataset to predict if a driver will file an insurance claim in the following year. Specify an output size in the config. By default, the model will create as many records as the input dataset.

cards.title: Boost minority class data
cards.description: Train a model on a dataset with sparse instances of the minority class, and conditionally generate additional minority samples.

cards.title: Synthesize highly dimensional data
cards.description: Train a synthetic ACTGAN model designed to easily handle datasets with 50k+ records and 100+ columns.

sampleDataset.description: This dataset of monthly customer charges contains sensitive information and more than 20 columns.

cards.title: Evaluate classification and regression
cards.description: Validate the quality of synthetic data for classification/regression tasks.

cards.title: Automatic anonymization for GDPR
cards.description: Use our Transform and Synthetics generative AI-based models to anonymize sensitive data to meet GDPR standards.

cards.title: Benchmark multiple synthetic models
cards.description: Evaluate multiple synthetic data models on a standardized benchmark with a single function.

cards.title: Generate text including song lyrics using GPT
cards.description: Create natural language text data including song lyrics.

sampleDataset.description: Create believable song lyrics using this dataset of Taylor Swift hits.

cards.title: Remove sensitive data from unstructured text
cards.description: Use Named Entity Recognition (NER) to detect and redact personally identifiable data in free text fields.

sampleDataset.description: Unstructured text datasets are useful for training chatbots or other models that need large amounts of data. The emails in this public dataset need to be de-identified before they can be used to train ML models.
